channel.title: No residence property
channel.description:
in W1, no residence, no chests, no sign of life, and its full of rich iron blocks so I'm taking them all.
Had a talk with Zuppers and even Davidi2 to run past if it was against the rules, as far as we're concerned it's fine. They deserve it anyway, all they do is fly hack and cheat.
Don't know who owns it, theres a few people in that area but, when he notices the server has helped itself to his blocks he's gonna obviously report it, so I'm just gonna post once then ignore him.
I'm pretty sure Moparisthebest will have no issue with this - though, Mopar, if you do I'd like to remind you about my mob tower near your house in W1.
Have a nice day all.

item.title: No residence property
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

Shoot over the cords so I can investigate as well

Read full topic

item.title: No residence property
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I guess I’ll try to install an anti-xray plugin and see what happens, last time it ground the server to a halt.

Read full topic

item.title: No residence property
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Uhh, these people…

They’ve already replaced almost the entire eagle in a few days, that’s 4 stacks of iron blocks. They claimed they have an iron farm, after later asking the people who live there and are building it they claim no such thing exists.

It’s just one person says this, another says the polar opposite, half of them don’t know where they are, and the rest can’t speak fluent English. I went to inspect their eagle in sneak mode, they all somehow managed to spot me through 3 walls and ran directly to me.

Pretty sure I caught one of them flying again too though I’ll bring further video evidence forward for that within the coming days. I’m telling you, I’m 99.9% sure they’re up to something again and I will prove it in due time.

As for others suspected of cheating such as:

Summerwine1
DWD

I’ve moved my IG player into their mines and local area so will be inspecting to find out what exactly is going on and if they’re influencing anybody else to cheat if found cheating. Aside from that the next person to look at is jrub with his stacks of diamond blocks on W2.

These modifications just ruin this server, I hoped it wouldn’t come to me doing this but every other plugin is useless and does little to help us against most issues. The more effective deterrent is to send a clear message stating we’re not having this on moparcraft anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: No residence property
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

lol… Burn baby burn

Read full topic

item.title: No residence property
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Made my post, and that’s all I have to say - For too long have people stood behind the idea that “if a staff member does his job efficiently its abuse” this isn’t abuse, this is stopping a group of yobs who have ran circles around this servers rules for months.

Sometimes you gotta do what you gotta do.

edit-Problem solved, wasn’t as drama entailed as I expected I think deep down he knew he was in the wrong so accepted it within 5 minutes or so of discussing it. He knew I had video proof and eye witness accounts on him I think.

Rules were made to stop people like this, not protect their cheated yield.

Here;

Read full topic

item.title: No residence property
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The structure consists of ~6 stacks of iron blocks, multiple gold, there other structures consist of multiple diamond/gold/iron blocks too, while I’m sure its abandoned as the res was allowed to expire and there is no chests or anything within the house it’s not so much plundering why I decided to remove them, the same people who were caught xraying/flying multiple times built it so it’s all distributed between who got there, or burned.

Whenever I see them they’re not even speaking English, I’ve had my property griefed by them while they were cheating on more than two occasions, they’ve attacked myself and Si force while fly hacking, they’ve helped people ban evade, they’ve wasted my time by lieing to me about who people are, they were caught flying again after just being banned, needless to say I’m sick of this “I can cheat, get banned, but I keep the cheated things” ideal, I’m sorting these Spanish idiots out once and for all now.

And the only way to do that is to hit them where it hurts, the pocket. Once they’re back to ground level they either play properly or be banned again.

Moparisthebest:

About your mob tower, you told me you moved and you were never coming back, and since it was taking mobs that should be spawning in my tower, I went ahead and took it down. If I thought you would care at all I wouldn’t have done it.

I don’t really care about my mob tower, and I wasn’t coming back - I just came to see if you’d changed anything (i wasn’t even there a day or so) I’m long gone again now

Read full topic

item.title: No residence property
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I don’t understand, are these abandoned, or do you just suspect them of cheating?

About your mob tower, you told me you moved and you were never coming back, and since it was taking mobs that should be spawning in my tower, I went ahead and took it down. If I thought you would care at all I wouldn’t have done it.

Read full topic
